forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun prepares to rise over the bay, the city of San Francisco greets the morning under a cloak of cloudiness, offering a glimpse of the signature charm that defines this coastal haven. With a low hovering around a comfortable 57 degrees, the day embarks with a tranquil chill in the air, the gentle west-southwest wind weaving through the streets, whispering secrets of the day ahead. 

Later, as the sun casts its warm gaze, expect mostly sunny skies to grace the city, transitioning from the muted tones of dawn to a brighter palette by midday. The high temperature, nearing 65 degrees, will invite a soothing warmth—perfect for stepping outside and delving into the multitude of urban experiences awaiting. The breeze, brisk at times with gusts reaching up to 22 mph, insists a light jacket or cardigan be kept close at hand, just in case the air turns sharp as the day wears on. The patches of marine layer may still linger, veiling the majestic outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge in the distance, creating an ethereal quality to the views of this storied landscape. Take a moment to stroll through one of the city's picturesque parks or perhaps indulge in a leisurely café visit, appreciating the ambiance created by the gentle sounds of the city waking up. The morning’s hint of fog adds a softened beauty to the surroundings, making this day not just pleasant but a reminder of the nuanced character of San Francisco.
